attributes.background: He has stood up to personel threats to his own safety and has remained strong and dignified in all his efforts. He has never picked up arms but has won one of the greatest victories this country has ever known and should be fully recognised by queen and country.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
